channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Ariana Grande Addresses Ticket Resellers: ‘It’s Not Right’
item.description: 🎤 Ariana Grande shuts down ticket resellers like a boss! 💪 Let's keep it fair for all the fans! 🎫 #ArianaGrande #FairPlay

item.title: Selena Gomez Says This Movie Will Be Required Viewing for Her Kids
item.description: 🎬 Selena Gomez's future movie nights are sorted! 🍿 Can't wait to watch with her future little rockstars! 🌟 #MovieNight #ParentsPick

item.title: Sharon Osbourne Breaks Silence Following Ozzy Osbourne’s Death: ‘Still Having Trouble Finding the Words’
item.description: Sending love to Sharon Osbourne during this difficult time 💔 Let's keep her in our thoughts 🙏 #SupportSharon #MusicNews

item.title: Coldplay Say to ‘Send Love Anywhere,’ Charlie Kirk’s Family Included, at London Show
item.description: 💫 Coldplay spreads love worldwide at London show, including Charlie Kirk's family! 🌍💕 #SpreadLove #ColdplayLive

item.title: Turnstile to Kick Off 2025 US Headlining Tour
item.description: 🔥 Tour alert! 🎸 Turnstile bringing the energy to US in 2025! Who's ready to jam with them? 🤘 #TurnstileTour2025
